name: Cocktail Punch
description:
Totally missed the start of this year’s Houdini Game Jam. I found out with only one day remaining...😞.

I did like the theme; “Food Fight” though, so I figured I make something, anyway. Also, an excellent opportunity to test a new workflow with kinefx rigging, and export animations directly from Houdini to Godot in GLTF format. So this is an “unofficial” entry to this year’s jam.

Used SideFX Houdini for all models, textures, rigging and animations.

Game engine: Godot

The Game

Turn your opponent in to pulp. One of you will become the main ingredient of the party drink.

Gameplay

W or arrow up to jump

A or arrow left to go left

D or arrow right to go right

SPACE or left mouse to throw a "punch"

Jump and punch for a "Power Punch"
